query.mssql: if not exists (select * from sysobjects where name='micros_report_aloqabank' and xtype='U') CREATE TABLE micros_report_aloqabank( id INT IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY, emolyee_name VARCHAR, emolyee_department VARCHAR, completed INT, overdue INT, well_done INT, bad_done INT, in_process INT, department_id INT)
query.postgres: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS micros_report_aloqabank( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, department_name VARCHAR, all_tasks INT, overdue INT, well_done INT, bad_done INT, in_process INT, stoped INT)
INSERT INTO micros_report_aloqabank( department_name, all_tasks, overdue, well_done, bad_done , in_process, stoped) VALUES ('{0}', {1}, {2}, {3}, {4}, {5}, {6});
